com.cypher.breadmote

Interface ComponentListener


  • public interface ComponentListener
    Used to actively listen to component changes while connected to a device
    See Also:
    Connection.addListener(ComponentListener), Connection.removeListener(ComponentListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onComponentAdded(Component component)
      Called when a new component is added by the connected device
      void onComponentCreation(boolean isCreating) 
      void onComponentRemoved(int index)
      Called when a component is removed by the connected device
      void onComponentUpdated(int index)
      Called when a component is updated by the connected device
      void setComponents(java.util.List<Component> components)
      Called either when the component list is being refreshed or when the listener is first added

    • Method Detail

      • onComponentAdded

        void onComponentAdded(Component component)
        Called when a new component is added by the connected device
        Parameters:
        component - The newly added component

      • onComponentUpdated

        void onComponentUpdated(int index)
        Called when a component is updated by the connected device
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the updated component
        See Also:
        setComponents(List)

      • onComponentRemoved

        void onComponentRemoved(int index)
        Called when a component is removed by the connected device
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the removed component
        See Also:
        setComponents(List)

      • setComponents

        void setComponents(java.util.List<Component> components)
        Called either when the component list is being refreshed or when the listener is first added
        Parameters:
        components - The current list of components specified by the connected device

      • onComponentCreation

        void onComponentCreation(boolean isCreating)
        Parameters:
        isCreating - true if the component list is being requested by this device, false otherwise
        See Also:
        Connection.refreshComponents()
